    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shadow Sight](/Feats.aspx?ID=2512) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fetchling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=300" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=120" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 87 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per hour

</column>

---

You draw on your connection with the [Shadow Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=11) to see through all but the deepest darkness. You gain [greater darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415) for 1 minute.
